success book

one of the goals that so would be good

god started opening up doors in

now these students are on the ground

the students are visiting hundreds of

plus they're organizing a great gospel

for several months these students have

everyone in town has heard about the

there's so many people there that they

have an idea they say let's climb up on

be encouraged jesus says your sins are

jesus says
uh your sins are forgiven
and jesus says get up and go home

well when i got to the end of that that

maybe i offended them maybe i

and so they they went back into the town

the people that had walked off
they
came back
but carrying their grandma
on a bed
and it wasn't just one or two it was

and they came across the field carrying

then another country that we went to

before we were supposed to go and do our
crusade
they passed a law that said because of
coved you weren't allowed to have any

like god should we go should we stay at

put up all the posters but now people
can't come to the crusade well we
decided that even if there's
restrictions we we still need to go to
preach the gospel because even people
who are sick with covet
they still need to hear the gospel
so we went
and we instead of having one big crusade
we decided to go from village to village
in that area and just gathering all the

and so we wanted to take some good
pictures
of the
the people that were being touched by
god and so we we just asked around and
said is there anybody you know who who's

a guy at the national tv station he's
really good at taking pictures
and so we hired him and brought him with
us to to the crusade what we didn't know
is that he was a muslim
his name it was durkish
and he was a muslim and this muslim
camera man he came with us and he was
taking pictures in every single village
and we went to like six or seven
villages every single day we go preach
at a village get everybody saved then go
to the next village and do the same
thing again pray for people get them
saved go to the next village and and
this this muslim named dukish and and i
began to talk to him and he said that he
was from the mandingo tribe in sierra
leone in the mandingo tribe 99 of the
tribe is muslim they've been muslim
going back
many many years hundreds of years
and so
we were taking pictures he was taking
pictures but every day six or seven
times he was hearing the gospel message
over and over and over again
and at the end of the week we we told
all the villages we're going to have a
big baptism service and so everybody who
got saved come to the baptism service
and we'll baptize you and the night
before dukish came to us he said i want
to be baptized
and we said do you know what that means
he said yeah
that means that i want to be a christian
now and we say that's right
and so we took dulkish and put that
picture up on the screen we took him we
took him down into the river and we
baptized dulkish and he became a
christian he has eight members in his
family we sent a pastor over to his
house all eight members of the family
got saved and so he was one of 153
people that we baptized that day
and uh so that was just a tremendous
testimony
then
in tanzania i showed you the video from

one month before he was scheduled to go

gave his life to jesus
and it was a huge miracle

he had a plan for follow-up he says

got them all together and one night he

and so abdul he was there he got kicked

on the night that they started talking

abdul

when i was 14 years old i went on my

and
we were going out into the neighborhoods

and
we just wanted to take a shower and fall
into bed
but when we got to the hotel there was a
problem
for some reason all the water in the
hotel had been shut off
and so we couldn't take a shower but
someone in the group was a smart
missionary and said
let's just go down to the swimming pool
and take a shower in the swimming pool
so that's what we did we just took our
shampoo we took our soap we went down to
the swimming pool
and we're just swimming around in the
swimming pool
and uh as we're swimming i noticed that
off on the the corner of the swimming
pool there there was a light and there
was this panel and there was smoke and
and sparks coming out of this panel
and so very foolishly
i decided to swim over there and
investigate
the smoking panel
i didn't say i was the smartest
missionary i'm just a willing
i'm looking at this panel
and as i'm looking at suddenly
the light that was under the water it
shocked my leg
and it scared me because you can die
from
electricity and water like that this
whole side of my body went numb
and i i managed to pull myself out of
the pool
and and i was walking away and i was
just thanking god
i said thank you god so much for saving
me
thank you for saving me jesus
and i was
six steps away from the pool
when suddenly i remembered that all of
my friends were still in the pool
and i immediately became very concerned
for their safety so i rushed back over
them i started yelling guys guys get out
of the pool get out of the pool if you
stay in the pool you're going to die it
shocked me
well they were all teenagers they
thought i was joking they thought it was
a practical joke so they were laughing
at me guys guys get out of the pool if
you stay in the pool you're going to die
and i begin
and i was so concerned for their safety
that i even started grabbing some of

and and pulling them out of the pool
if it had been you i wouldn't have been
able to save you
but
i was grabbing them and and pull
i was pulling them out of the pool

and and everyone
got out of the pool and thank god no one

daniel
you need to have the same passion
